column5: Huge Mansion Perfect for super bowl. Close to NRG stadium, super bowl concert venue, heights, midtown, and downtown nightlife. Parking fits 10+ vehicles. Luxury at its finest! Multiple Living rooms, dining rooms and kitchens. Perfect for a large group!  Childrens beds will be replaced with queen beds.   5 BD 3 Full Bath
column8: HUGE Mansion for Super Bowl, close to everything
